said I was spoken to by the principal of
her Catholic school and the Director of
Religious Education at the school we
were told that they had heard rumors
that about Katie's suit and they wanted
to let us know that the priest of the
church did not want Katie to wear a suit
to First Communion she would need to
wear a dress to First Communion or that
she could receive First Communion in her
suit privately but not a part of the

first found out you wouldn't be able to
wear us just the suit yeah because then
I wouldn't get to see my friend and I
couldn't wear him either I was kind of
taken aback because katie has worn suits
so often to church I didn't think it

kids to a school where I know that
they're not going to be loved and
accepted for the six hours a day that
